Nursery School

Where We Are
Follow Us

The Nursery School (Preschool)

The Nursery School (Preschool) "I Bambini del Circo Massimo" is a child care school for children ranging from 3 months to 3 years old. It's located on a single floor of 220 squared meters indoor plus a garden of 150 squared meters. The common area at the entrance contains the lobby and a multipurpose hall dedicated to meals and some daily activities.

The hall dedicated to infants is divided into a game area and a sleeping section. There are three big multipurpose rooms for expressive activities, symbolic games and psychomotricity.

The location of the nursery schools allows to divide childrens into different age ranges. In every room there's a place for changing children. Every environment is designed to promote social activities and autonomy of every child, it's child-friendly and well suited for the child age.

The nursery school contains an external garden equipped with several outdoor games and an internal kitchen where we prepare fresh meals every day.

Why choosing us?

Qualified Staff

The nursery school is managed by psychologists and professional educators.

Continuous Training

The staff continuously follows courses for first aid, PBLS, HACCP and security.

Music Workshops

Children follow music workshops with Gordon's method, given by professional teachers.

Healthy Food

Our food menu are developed by a nutritionist.

Flexible hours

We provide several options for exit hours to help families.

English and Spanish

Let's become citizens of the world! Learning a second language enriches and stimulates curiosity in children..

Workshops

Do you want to know more?

Contact us for scheduling a visit. We'll show you the location and our educational project.

Maria Montessori
